Well, I noticed the Kenshin paintable figure is from a merchant in
Bangkok where (resin figures?) are an artform (contests etc)...what
you do is take pics to the store and they basically can build you
one...for a price (it takes time)...anyways we can always "convert"
Kenshin into Okita...paint on a uniform,etc ^_^
--------------------------------------------
They revised the page so you will not see silhouettes/shadows anymore
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/
At our Spy Division mailing list I uploaded a group pic of the cast w/
Jo Odagiri and beard (scanned from a book)

secretarytocapt3
still thinking about the "kinshin" punishment...
